title: Introductory Statistics Education Course Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Basic Mathematics and Understanding of Fundamental Data Analysis Concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasizes collaborative learning environments for current professionals, focusing on offline activities using digital devices (laptops/tablets).

learning_goals: Students can calculate and interpret descriptive statistics (mean, variance, standard deviation, etc.) for a given dataset
Students can apply the hypothesis testing process to analyze practical problems and derive meaningful conclusions
Students demonstrate the ability to design experiments and interpret results based on statistical concepts through collaborative activities (group projects)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
